sourcesContent:
// client/src/pages/HomePage.js import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; const hotels = [ { id: 1, name: 'Sayeman Beach Resort', location: "Kalatoli, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/4CAF50/FFFFFF?text=Hotel+Room', amenities: ['Garden', 'Swimming Pool', 'Air Conditioning'], rating: '⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️', discount: '40% off', price: 'BDT 5,858', roomsRemaining: 5, promoText: 'Extra 5% discount for bKash payment.', isCoupleFriendly: false, isAccessible: false, }, { id: 2, name: 'Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa', location: "Inani, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/2196F3/FFFFFF?text=Luxury+Suite', amenities: ['Couple Friendly', 'Accessible', 'Air Conditioning'], rating: '⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️', discount: '30% off', price: 'BDT 7,200', roomsRemaining: 2, promoText: 'Extra 5% discount for bKash payment.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, { id: 3, name: 'Long Beach Hotel Cox\'s Bazar', location: "Koliatoli, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/FF5722/FFFFFF?text=Long+Beach+Hotel', amenities: ['Restaurant', 'Spa', 'Pool'], rating: '⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️', discount: '15% off', price: 'BDT 6,500', roomsRemaining: 10, promoText: 'Complimentary breakfast.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, { id: 4, name: 'Hotel The Cox Today', location: "Main Road, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/FFC107/FFFFFF?text=The+Cox+Today', amenities: ['Rooftop Pool', 'Fitness Center', 'Conference Hall'], rating: '⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️', discount: '25% off', price: 'BDT 8,100', roomsRemaining: 3, promoText: 'Free airport shuttle.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, ]; const HomePage = () => { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}
StayHotel
Flight Hotel Tour Visa Gift Card
{/* Hero Section with Vibrant Background */}

Your Perfect Getaway Awaits!

Discover amazing hotels and experiences around the world.

{/* Search Bar Section */}
{/* Content Section (Rooms List) */}

Filters

{hotels.length} properties found

{hotels.map(hotel => (

{hotel.name}

{hotel.rating} | {hotel.location}

{hotel.roomsRemaining <= 5 && (

{hotel.roomsRemaining} Rooms Remaining

)}
{hotel.amenities.map(amenity => ( {amenity} ))}

{hotel.discount}

{hotel.promoText}

Starts from

{hotel.price} / night, per room

))}
); }; export default HomePage;
